text: Novonikolayevka () is a rural locality (a village) in Bakeyevsky Selsoviet, Sterlibashevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 71 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 13 km from Sterlibashevo, 1 km from Bakeyevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlibashevsky District
title: Novonikolayevka, Sterlibashevsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
